channel.title: morling.dev -- Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Oleksii Danyliuk

item.title: X-Tee system admin responsibility.
item.description: System admin is important role in X-Road system. There a few documents contain information about system admin responsobility: An official statute. X-Road documentation. Agreement between security server owner and RIA To make it clearer I created a list of responsibilities: Archive the message log. The agreement with RIA is more precise about it. Setup the granted access policy rules.

item.title: X-Tee test request.
item.description: I am sure you have recognized that X-Tee has one more security server (SS), and yes, this is one I have launched :) I want to share with you a few moments that took me a bit of time to understand. At the beginning, I assume that you have already installed, registered SS and some of the data providers open to your endpoints. The first unexpected situation had to do with documentation.
